name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @YAppelbaum: "Trump and others aligned with his message know that once people understand slavery’s entanglement in every facet of U.S. history, the legitimacy of its systems unravels—and with it, the legitimacy of those occupying the spaces of power.” —@ClintSmithIII https://t.co/vSwS2Mawt3

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @elainejgodfrey: Wouldn't court packing just mean an endless zig zag pattern of adding new justices every time a new party is in power? Wouldn't it ... eventually degrade the Court's legitimacy? 

I asked @TakeBacktheCt's @AaronBelkin these questions. Here's what he said:

https://t.co/d2zZ1LhAFo

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @JeffreyGoldberg: "Most likely, your future is also brighter than what you may think at your darkest moments, so dispute your pessimism not with mindless optimism, but with facts."

As usual, great advice from @arthurbrooks (via @TheAtlantic):
https://t.co/H7x3ItXxbE

name: TheAtlantic
text: For years, the Gates Foundation has documented gradual progress in public health—fewer children dying, less malnutrition, longer life spans. But COVID-19 has set back the world dramatically, @BillGates said in an interview with @edyong209: https://t.co/BI98UqOh64

name: TheAtlantic
text: Pessimism and a sense of powerlessness about the future are a near-perfect cocktail for misery. During the pandemic, it’s not just one person's future that feels bleak; it's all of ours. In "How to Build a Life," @arthurbrooks offers advice on how to cope: https://t.co/L9hrlWTnab

name: TheAtlantic
text: Related: If we lean into times of transition instead of resisting them, they can be seasons of great growth, @arthurbrooks wrote earlier this month. https://t.co/tjYNncxuF7

name: TheAtlantic
text: If the vote is close, Donald Trump could easily throw the election into chaos and subvert the result. Join @AdrienneLaF and @bartongellman at #TheAtlanticFest for a conversation about Gellman’s latest cover story and our potentially turbulent future. https://t.co/hX1nRCwEEl

name: TheAtlantic
text: Democrats' path to a Senate majority may be much easier if they can keep the Supreme Court debate focused on the Affordable Care Act, writes @RonBrownstein. https://t.co/GDO3OrfPff

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @TheAtlanticFest: Trump's Election Day strategy is not one of someone who thinks he will win. - @bartongellman at #TheAtlanticFest.

Read his November cover story here: https://t.co/UTKyZLnmxZ https://t.co/APUKLRoOds

name: TheAtlantic
text:

text:

name: TheAtlantic
text: "More doctors and hospitals need to acknowledge and address how the U.S. health-care system is rife with structural racism," @ZekeEmanuel and @Risalavizzo write. "For decades, American medicine has discriminated against people of color." https://t.co/i3fgiZZKHm

name: TheAtlantic
text: For nearly four years, the United States has been governed by a nationalist president who has taken foreign policy in a different direction from his predecessors. Join foreign-affairs experts for a conversation on where we’re headed: https://t.co/Z7xk5FN2qi. #TheAtlanticFest

name: TheAtlantic
text: The "unprecedented pattern of conduct by the nation’s chief law-enforcement officer has brought a question to the minds of many people: Why does Bill Barr do the things he does?" Donald Ayer writes: https://t.co/NtmBACBftJ

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @TheAtlanticFest: Staff Writer at @TheAtlantic @TomMcTague's thoughts at #TheAtlanticFest on how the president has changed America's place in the world, and how the world's view of the United States is evolving. https://t.co/XTs8goKaiLStaff Writer at @TheAtlantic @TomMcTague's thoughts at #TheAtlanticFest on how the president has changed America's… https://t.co/tr4EfdB3z4

text: RT @JohnGHendy: "QAnon is dangerous precisely because it isn’t hanging out in isolated subreddits, full of people who are committing obviously bannable offenses." https://t.co/zXDnbRSigf via @kait_tiffany

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Trump and others aligned with his message know that once people understand slavery’s entanglement in every facet of U.S. history, the legitimacy of its systems unravels," @ClintSmithIII writes: https://t.co/3pZ2xMBoBX

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @TheAtlanticFest: How has the pandemic affected the perception of America’s power? @TheAtlantic’s @anneapplebaum discusses now with @prashantrao and @TomMcTague. To join the conversation, tweet us using the event hashtag #TheAtlanticFest https://t.co/5b2kkJ3fua https://t.co/DDnsIMW86K

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The deep strangeness of '76 Days' is that it has a conclusion at all; it shows things getting better, people recovering, and the worst of the disease beginning to dissipate." @davidlsims on the harrowing first major documentary made about the pandemic: https://t.co/y6XNTYre3s

name: TheAtlantic
text:
How can policy makers, business leaders, and public-health advocates make sure that everyone—no matter their skin color, income, or hometown—has a healthy future amid the pandemic? #TheAtlanticFest
https://t.co/SrPbzWh2KP

name: TheAtlantic
text: "By the time I left government several years ago, well before the pandemic broke, it was already well past time to reconnect foreign policy to domestic renewal," William J. Burns writes: https://t.co/6lDw7TAnvi

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @TomMcTague: Thanks to @prashantrao and @anneapplebaum for today’s discussion. Is there a decline and fall in American power? Listen in. https://t.co/ftQ4M9DQWo

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @PadmaLakshmi: I'll be speaking about Taste The Nation, immigration & American identity today at @TheAtlanticFest at 8pm EST/5pm PST✨ Watch here: https://t.co/Dj0q6YHXGS https://t.co/q9Qo31HDFf

name: TheAtlantic
text: Tune in to our discussion about what must happen in order to reform, if not rebuild, a criminal-justice system that has for too long been based on racial inequity. #TheAtlanticFest https://t.co/UvPOCXH8oV

name: TheAtlantic
text: Join the filmmakers and a star of “Boys State” to discuss the film, how national political divisions play out in the process of 1,000 high-school seniors creating a government, and what gives them hope. #TheAtlanticFest https://t.co/xJbj7zEePg

name: TheAtlantic
text: Join us during the fourth and final night of #TheAtlanticFest for a performance by the cast of the Broadway show "Ain't Too Proud," all about the life and times of the Temptations. https://t.co/SWufYjtYn4 https://t.co/ZVrrghbgRA
